mapper.select: SELECT auth_nm_seq AS authNmSeq, auth_nm AS authNm FROM auth_name WHERE auth_nm <> 'developer'

SELECT auth.auth_nm_seq AS authNmSeq, name.auth_nm AS authNm FROM authority auth LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT auth_nm_seq, auth_nm FROM auth_name WHERE auth_nm <> 'developer') name ON name.auth_nm_seq = auth.auth_nm_seq WHERE user_seq = #{userNo}
